ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF-427 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.29"
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] specimen (CONF-443)
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Specimen
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id

Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode
Need to add value set to term model for The value for "[Act | Observation | Procedure] / statusCode" in a procedure activity SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.15 ProcedureStatusCode STATIC 20061017.

MAY contain at least one [1..*] participant
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounter Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.45)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] performer
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Performer2

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.28)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.38)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Instruction (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.49)

contains one or more Procedure / methodCode if the method isn't inherent in Procedure / code or if there is a need to further specialize the method in Procedure / code. Procedure / methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code. (CONF-435)

contains one or more Procedure / targetSiteCode to indicate the anatomical site or system that is the focus of the procedure, if the site isn't inherent in Procedure / code or if there is a need to further specialize the site in Procedure / code. Procedure / targetSiteCode SHALL NOT conflict with the site inherent in Procedure / code (CONF-436)
specimen / specimenRole / id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer / specimen / specimenRole / id to indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen. (CONF-444)
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClass
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code

Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode
Need to add value set to term model for The value for "[Act | Observation | Procedure] / statusCode" in a procedure activity SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.15 ProcedureStatusCode STATIC 20061017.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime

MAY contain at least one [1..*] specimen (CONF-443)
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Specimen

MAY contain at least one [1..*] participant
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounter Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.45)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] performer
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Performer2

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.28)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.38)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Instruction (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.49)
A procedure activity MAY have one or more associated consents, represented in the CCD Header as ClinicalDocument / authorization / consent. (CONF-442)
A procedure activity SHALL contain one or more sources of information, as defined in section 5.2 Source. (CONF-447)

contains one or more Procedure / methodCode if the method isn't inherent in Procedure / code or if there is a need to further specialize the method in Procedure / code. Procedure / methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code. (CONF-435)

contains one or more Procedure / targetSiteCode to indicate the anatomical site or system that is the focus of the procedure, if the site isn't inherent in Procedure / code or if there is a need to further specialize the site in Procedure / code. Procedure / targetSiteCode SHALL NOT conflict with the site inherent in Procedure / code (CONF-436)
specimen / specimenRole / id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer / specimen / specimenRole / id to indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen. (CONF-444)
